body:
It means deport, imprison or by any means remove foreign soldiers and their families for no matter the reason being there.
Origin of USA's 3rd ammendment giving no quarter to military officials: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quartering_Acts

Its a good way to hold nations accountable for the actions of their military. Saved many native american lives and prevented the globalist Napoleon from making the continental language of Europe French. A language that was artificially decided by royal decree, specious, snarly and obtuse by design. After the French went all inclusive merging with their enemy in the greatest act of suppression the bloated nation then slaughtered itself in confusion during their revolution and got their ass kicked by Germany for frances many war crimes prior. Then WWII happens, Britain jumps in to be a cuck about how only they get to kick the ass of buddy retard france. Lets be honest here geographically france is the shithole barrens chat of Europe full of gypsies, land pirates and terrorists. If it were a state it would be Arizona.

Every nation says the lie that Paris is beautiful and france is great only so their property value does not drop and they have access to trade routes. Its not respect its pity for the poor bastards. Truth Matters.

“ I would consider those to be the absolute minimum for a free speech page to be a haven not only for one group of extremists, but for everyone.”
